TopicTitle: I need help changing sc-9001 and mystery goo

Articles.Content: Every time I try playing carrer mode I just end up rage quiting because the sc-9001 and the mystery goo mess up my designs. I want to make the two parts smaller, useing the the gravimax detector module for the sc-9001 and the seismic accelerometer module for the mystery goo. I also need help with changing the textures for the modules so I don't get confused. If there are any add ons that anybody knows about that change the sc 9001 and mystery goo can you please let me know. Thank you for reading and for your help

I'm fairly sure the modulemanager mod allows you to modify stuff like that. But I personally have no experience with it.

Here's the link: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55219-Module-Manager-1-5-6-%28Jan-6%29

Thank you this is better then what I wanted! I can just edit the files so I get the parts earlier.
